item.title: [PI] How to fix Godsword Dismantle Dupe
item.dc:creator: @Puffscape Puffscape
item.description:
@Puffscape wrote:

The reason why people we’re able to dupe with Godswords is because the Second Click on the Weapon “Dismantle” required a godsword to do it but it did not have the code } else { wich means it doesnt allow it unless you have the item. I tested it and it works perfectly. Here’s a code on what i did to fix it.

case 11694:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(11694)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(11694, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(11690, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(11702, 1);
c.sendMessage(“You Dismantle Your Godsword And Get A Blade And A Hilt”);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You need a godsword to dismantle it you duping little jerk”);
}
break;

There, i hope you this this useful and if you ever need help with PI coding i could probly help you so feel free to ask or comment on this post what your problem is! Thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to fix Godsword Dismantle Dupe
